magpie.data.utilities

Class DatasetHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.Dataset
      • magpie.data.utilities.DatasetHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Citable, Commandable, Options, Printable, Savable

    public abstract class DatasetHelper
extends Dataset
    This class provides useful operations for handling Datasets (and their derivatives)

      • split

        public static Dataset split(Dataset D,
            org.apache.commons.collections.Predicate P)
        Split a dataset given a predicate (see Apache Common's Collections) Predicate returns a boolean about whether an entry should be moved
        Parameters:
        D - Dataset to be operated on
        P - Predicate capable on operating on each entry
